name: Printables
description: Print-optimized formats for job boards, recipe cards, and run sheets for physical posting and field reference.

prd.problemStatement: Physical documentation remains important for crew rooms and field work. Print-optimized formats ensure clarity and usability in non-digital contexts.
userStories: As a superintendent, I want to print job boards so that crew can reference assignments in the crew room
As a crew member, I want printed recipe cards so that I have clear instructions in the field
